notice_when_upgrade:
Please make sure all nodes in the cluster are in normal status (primary or secondary, and not doing initial sync).
Please make a backup before upgrading the cluster, and upgrade when the business is not busy.
Caution: there will be two master-slave switches during the upgrade process, please make sure that the client is ready for the situation!
Caution: please run the custome service 'fixOpligSize' when the cluster status is normal after ugrade.
